TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttributeTable extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The attribute table is a read-only collection of metadata attributes that are associated with specific types, members, and dependencies.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This table is created using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> and is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore>.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTable> is created using the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.AttributeTableBuilder> and is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.Metadata.MetadataStore>.

Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all types that have attribute overrides, on a property, member, or the type itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This can be used to determine what types will be refreshed when this attribute table is added to the metadata store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ContainsAttributes(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to check for metadata.
Docs.summary: Determines whether this table contains metadata for the given type.
Docs.returns: if the table contains metadata for the type at the class level or metadata associated with a or ; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the given arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method never returns a null enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type to get class-level attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all class-level attributes provided for the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes (Type ownerType, System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor descriptor);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type ownerType, class System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor descriptor) cil managed

Docs.param: The type that contains the member.
A member descriptor to get custom attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes (Type ownerType, System.Reflection.MemberInfo member);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type ownerType, class System.Reflection.MemberInfo member) cil managed

Docs.param: The type that contains the member.
The member to provide attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes (Type ownerType, string memberName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type ownerType, string memberName) cil managed

Docs.param: The owner type of the dependency property.
The name of the member to provide attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified member of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes (Type ownerType, System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetCustomAttributes(class System.Type ownerType, class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed

Docs.param: The owner type of the dependency property.
A dependency property to get custom attributes for.
Docs.summary: Returns an enumeration of all attributes provided for the specified dependency of the specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration of attributes that match the criteria. This will never return a null enumeration.
